content.question:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

a) Identify one way in which the peace settlement that ended the First World War led to the rise of fascism.
b) Explain one way in which the Great Depression contributed to political extremism in Europe.
c) Explain one factor that contributed to the development of the Cold War.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
